content: bamboo bloom cowl and infinity scarf materials 1 skein of bamboo bloom handpaints by universal yarn us 10 10 5 or 11 circular needle 16 or 24 1 yarn needle for weaving ends instructions cast on 80 single loop cowl or 160 double loop infinity scarf stitches loosely knit cast on is recommended join in the round knit every round purling only when the working yarn is thick and fluffy work in the pattern until you near the end of your yarn leaving 2-3 yards 4-6 yards for double loop to bind off select a bind off method such as a sewn bind off which will allow you to bind off loosely particularly if you are making the single loop cowl weave in ends block lightly if you d like otherwise pop on your new beautiful scarf and prepare to receive compliments enjoy
